text: The Metropolitan Transportation Authority Police, or MTA Police, is the police force of New York's Metropolitan Transportation Authority local railroad, or MTA. Officers of the MTA Police are full police officers in New York State and in the state of Connecticut. The force was started in 1998. == Related pages == *Metropolitan Transportation Authority *New York City Police Department *Color of the day (police) ==Other websites== *MTA Police Overtime Adding Up *MTA Police-A Consolidated Force *Request for Information Form *TransitCop.com Category:Law enforcement in New York (state) Category:Transport in New York (state) Category:Transport in Connecticut Category:Law enforcement agencies of the United States Category:1998 establishments in the United States Category:1990s establishments in New York (state) Category:20th-century establishments in Connecticut
title: Metropolitan Transportation Authority Police
